title: TopicOutputHandler
description: An outputhandler that outputs to a topic scalar values defined as Output Expressions in eTaSL.

is-TopicOutputHandler.description: A key to indicate that this describes a TopicOutputHandler which publishes scalar values defined as Output Expressions in eTaSL.

topic-name.description: Name of the ROS topic that will serve as output.

variable-names.description:
List of names of (scalar!) output expressions to output. 
 The current scalar value and a boolean is_declared are published for each of these variables to indicate if the variable is declared as a scalar output expression within the currently running eTaSL task specification.
